title: Stacey Solomon shows off grey hairs at 30 as she makes brutal joke about being a mum

Stacey Solomon is starting to get grey hairs at 30, and she has shared another brutally honest insight into life as a mum.

The mum-of-three took some much-needed time off to herself and visited the hairdressers for a quick spruce up.

But the honest reality star posted an Instagram story which showed a small patch of grey hair making an appearance, which she joked is a result of motherhood.

She wrote alongside the photo: "Joe joe is looking after Rex so I came for a little blow dry (it's been 13 days) and I can't get over my greys.

"Anyone else got almost a full head of grey hairs at 30?" she added with a laughing emoji.

The Loose Women panelist was left shocked at her discovery, which left her to say: "Motherhood is..." with another laughing face.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Stacey then showed off her freshly-dyed bouncy brunette locks in another clip later in the day.

It comes after the TV personality opened up about the struggles of breast feeding baby Rex, the newest addition to her family.

Rex is five-months-old, and Stacey shares him with partner Joe Swash .

The supermum continued her trend of honest mum posts with one on breast feeding.

(Image: Instagram)

She shared with her 2.3 million followers her struggles to breast feed baby Rex and that she's no longer breast feeding the little lad.

Stacey admitted it's taken her a while to be open about it.

She wrote on Instagram: "Sorry for the essay...So lots of people have been asking me if I'm still breast feeding. It's taken me a bit of time to feel okay about saying no.

"I stopped a couple of months ago & I really struggled to come to terms with it & actually say it out loud. Breast feeding never happened for me the way that I imagined."

The star wrote a huge paragraph explaining how she found it difficult, and praised other mums that are facing the same problem.

Stacey has two other children to previous partners - Zachary, 11, and Leighton, 7.
description: The mum of three boys is back with another honest post on her take of motherhood
